work_summary: Completed comprehensive directory audit reviews for Agents 5 and 1, plus D:\agent-tools repository audit. Identified critical coordination dashboard issues with outdated directory assignments affecting 14+ directories across multiple agents.
decisions_made: Completed Agent-5 analytics & data directory audit - all 6 assigned directories missing, reassigned to 4 alternative high-value analytics directories
Completed Agent-1 infrastructure & DevOps directory audit - 5/7 assigned directories missing, reassigned to existing critical infrastructure directories
Audited D:\agent-tools repository - identified dual tool architecture (tools/ vs tools_v2/) with excellent modernization path
Updated coordination dashboard with completion status and critical findings
Identified systematic issue: coordination dashboard contains invalid assignments across multiple agents
tradeoffs: Comprehensive audit approach provides complete understanding but requires significant time investment
Reassignment to alternative directories ensures productive work but deviates from original assignments
Detailed audit reports enable informed decision-making but create documentation overhead
Escalation of systematic coordination issues ensures long-term improvement but may require Captain intervention

cold_start_handoff.current_state: Directory audit Phase 1 complete for Agents 5, 1, and D:\agent-tools. Coordination dashboard updated with findings. Systematic issue identified with outdated directory assignments affecting multiple agents.
immediate_priorities: Review audit findings for directory reassignment decisions
Begin Phase 2 directory cleanup based on audit results
dependencies: Critical findings: Multiple agents have 14+ invalid directory assignments

knowledge_persisted: Agent-5 reassigned from 6 missing directories to 4 high-value analytics directories (agent_workspaces/, docs/, archive/, devlogs/)
Agent-1 reassigned from 5 missing directories to 4 critical infrastructure directories (migrations/, nginx/, sites/, tools/)
D:\agent-tools repository has dual architecture: legacy tools/ (200+ files) and modern tools_v2/ (excellent reference model)

Directory audit methodology: verify existence, assess value, recommend preservation/cleanup/archive
